alert.note: Alert for Frio; Medina (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 10:52PM CDT until May 13 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEDINA...NORTH CENTRAL DIMMIT...SOUTHEASTERN UVALDE...ZAVALA AND NORTHERN FRIO COUNTIES... At 1051 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sabinal to near Divot, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pearsall, La Pryor, Batesville, Sabinal, North Pearsall, Moore, D`Hanis, Washer, Brundage, Yancey, Divot, Loma Vista, Bluff, Frio Town and Three Oaks. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
